price: Maka tidakkah menjadi petunjuk bagi mereka (kaum musyrikin) berapa banyaknya Kami membinasakan umat-umat sebelum mereka, padahal mereka berjalan (di bekas-bekas) tempat tinggal umat-umat itu? Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu terdapat tanda-tanda bagi orang yang berakal.
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
